messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Go do it, my Pokémon!
I’ll work hard, too!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I think we’ll visit the TV station in
Jubilife City next.Or maybe we should go to the Global
Terminal?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Umm, aren’t you that Trainer who beat
us before?We feel good today, so we’ll be happy
to face you again!
